hero.title: Explore Rishikesh Like a Local
hero.subtitle: Best places to visit, scenic routes & scooty rentals
hero.description: Rishikesh is more than just rafting and temples. Discover hidden waterfalls, peaceful ghats, scenic mountain roads and cafes — best explored on a scooty or bike.

whyScooty.title: Why Explore Rishikesh on a Scooty?
points: Easy access to narrow hill roads
Freedom to stop anywhere for photos

places.name: Triveni Ghat
places.description: The most famous ghat in Rishikesh. Visit during evening Ganga Aarti for a peaceful spiritual experience.
places.tips: Reach early to get a good viewing spot.

places.name: Parmarth Niketan
places.description: A renowned ashram on the banks of River Ganga known for yoga, meditation and Ganga Aarti.

places.name: Beatles Ashram
places.description: A peaceful heritage site famous for meditation domes and wall art.

places.name: Neelkanth Mahadev Temple
places.description: A sacred Shiva temple surrounded by dense forest and scenic mountain roads.
places.tips: Scooty ride is scenic but drive carefully.

places.name: Neer Garh Waterfall
places.description: One of the most beautiful waterfalls near Rishikesh with a short trek.

places.name: Patna Waterfall
places.description: A calm and less crowded waterfall ideal for nature lovers.

places.name: Shivpuri
places.description: Adventure hub known for rafting camps and riverside cafes.

places.name: Ganga View Cafes
places.description: Relaxing cafes with river views, perfect for breakfast or sunset.

bikeRental.title: Scooty & Bike Rentals in Rishikesh
bikeRental.description: We provide well-maintained scooties and bikes so you can explore Rishikesh comfortably with local route guidance.

cta.whatsappText: Hi, I want to rent a scooty in Rishikesh and need local sightseeing guidance.

localTips: Start sightseeing early in the morning
Avoid riding near Jhulas during peak hours
Carry cash for parking & small shops
